description:
Toucan is tasked with taking work to Granny. Toucan is excited for summer vacation, but Lizard has some bad news. A nasty coworker is pulling pranks in the office and Toucan decides to take justice into his own hands.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Africa Fairy Tale: Little Red Toucan Hood / Africa Summer Vacation / Africa Nasty Coworker / Africa High-School Girls: Shishimura`s Morning / Africa High-School Girls: Gorimi`s Morning
Africa no Douwa: Hashi Zukin / Africa no Natsuyasumi / Africa no Inshitsu na Douryou / Africa no JK: Shishi Mura no Asa / Africa no JK: Gorimi no Asa
アフリカの童話 ハシずきん / アフリカの夏休み / アフリカの陰湿な同僚 / アフリカのJK~シシ村の朝~ / アフリカのJK~ゴリ美の朝~
